name: The Anthem
description: The Anthem is a popular venue located at 901 Wharf Street SW, Washington, DC 20024, known for its vibrant atmosphere and a wide range of performances. It offers food, drinks, and various seating options including Super Excellent Seating. The venue is accessible and provides services for mobility, hearing, and visually impaired guests. It features a box office that is open 7 days a week and offers fee-free tickets for all I.M.P. shows. Accessibility options and sign language interpretation are available upon request.
